short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Resizes images in GitHub PR descriptions by wrapping them in tags with a custom width

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A basic utility made for updating the uploaded screenshots on Github to html image tag for seamless width adjustment to avoid a large vertical scroll area on PRs. This extension is only works on Github website.

Features:
- Allow to customize width for currently uploaded or the previously uploaded screenshots
- Allow to move all the screenshots to screenshots section if available in the PR.

Note:
- Currently `Move to screenshots` will only move the images if the screenshot section is available. There is no option to customize this but maybe I will update in the future for adding support for that feature as well.
